name: Wipeout Pure: Classic Pack
summary: Being a four-part release for Japan, three for the US, and two for Europe (with the parts further spilt between content and music), this pack expands on the four classic tracks that came with the game, based on one of the tracks from each of the previous games. Goteki 45 and Icaras return to complete the Wipeout 3 lineup. This pack also includes four UI skins themed around the four DLC teams (Tigron, Van-Über, Goteki 45, and Icaras).
